title.value: BDD-based optimization for the quadratic stable set problem
title.justification: Based on the title provided at the beginning of the document.
title.quote: BDD-based optimization for the quadratic stable set problem.

extractions.description: This paper proposes a novel representation for the quadratic stable set problem (QSSP) using binary decision diagrams (BDDs) and introduces a hybrid optimization approach that integrates BDDs and mixed-integer programming (MIP) for solving the QSSP.

type.justification: The paper introduces a new representation and approach for solving an optimization problem, indicating a focus on theoretical development rather than empirical validation.
type.quote: we propose a novel representation for the QSSP through binary decision diagrams (BDDs) and adapt a hybrid optimization approach which integrates BDDs and mixed-integer programming (MIP) for solving the QSSP.

name.justification: The focus is on solving the quadratic stable set problem using optimization techniques.
name.quote: The quadratic stable set problem (QSSP) is a natural extension of the well-known maximum stable set problem.

name.justification: Machine learning is mentioned as a component within the method to guide search mechanisms.
name.quote: Machine learning then becomes a valuable component within the method to guide the search mechanisms.
